body_html:
I find the solution.
It's a problem caused by version of CUDA.

In the problem above, my CUDA version is V9.0.176. I uninstalled it and installed V8.0.61instead.
And cuDNN is V7.

Then the problem was solved.

body:
I find the solution.
It's a problem caused by version of CUDA. 

In the problem above, my CUDA version is V9.0.176. I uninstalled it and installed V8.0.61instead. 
And cuDNN is V7.

Then the problem was solved.
